name: Druidic Ritual
Start point: Kaqemeex in the stone circle north of Taverley.
Description: Help the druids cleanse their former altar of the evil from the dark wizards. If you are successful you will be rewarded with the knowledge of herblore.
Recommended: A weapon to defeat level 19 monsters.
Collecting the required meats before starting the quest.

substeps: Talk to Kaqemeex in the stone circle north of Taverley. He will ask you to speak with Sanfew.
Go to the Herblore Shop in Taverley.
Climb the stairs to the 2nd floor[UK]/3rd floor[US].
Talk to Sanfew. He will tell you he needs four different types of raw meat (rat, bear, chicken, beef) dipped into the Cauldron of Thunder.
Ensure you have Raw rat meat, Raw bear meat, Raw chicken, and Raw beef. (Can be collected before or during the quest).
Go to the Taverley Dungeon entrance, south-west of Taverley, surrounded by dead trees.
Enter the dungeon and head north until you reach a gate guarded by suits of armour.
Attempt to open the gate. A Suit of armour (level 19) will attack. Defeat it.
Attempt to open the gate again. A second Suit of armour (level 19) may attack. Defeat it.
Open the gate and enter the room.
Use each of the four raw meats on the Cauldron of Thunder. They will turn blue (enchanted).
Return to Sanfew on the upper floor of the Taverley Herblore Shop.
Talk to Sanfew with the enchanted meats in your inventory.
Return to Kaqemeex at the stone circle north of Taverley.
Talk to Kaqemeex to complete the quest and receive your reward.
